Package com.example.muhammad.chambers.c482.pa.controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
com.example.muhammad.chambers.c482.pa.controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class holds the functionality for the Modify Product Screen.

  • Method Details

    • onActionAddModifyProduct

      public void onActionAddModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This is the onActionAddModifyProduct method. This method is an ActionEvent method for the add button on the Modify Product Screen to add a part to the Product.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent that this applies to

    • onActionCancelModifyProduct

      public void onActionCancelModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This is the onActionCancelModifyProduct method. This method is an ActionEvent method to cancel/exit out of the Modify Product Screen.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent this applies to
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionRemoveAssociatedPart

      public void onActionRemoveAssociatedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This is the onActionRemoveAssociatedPart method. This method is an ActionEvent method to remove an associated part of the Product on the Modify Product Screen.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent this applies to

    • onActionSaveModifyProduct

      public void onActionSaveModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This is the onActionSaveModifyProduct method. This method is an ActionEvent method for the save button on the Modify Product Screen to save all changes made to the Product.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent this applies to
      Throws:
      IOException

    • topSearchBox

      public void topSearchBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This is the topSearchBox method. This is an ActionEvent method that is used with the TextField to obtain the user inputs and search for the items that matches the user input.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent this applies to

    • topPartTableOnClick

      public void topPartTableOnClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This is the topPartTableOnClick method. This is a MouseEvent method and is meant to obtain the row/object in the top table view that was clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent this applies to

    • bottomPartTableOnClick

      public void bottomPartTableOnClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This is the bottomPartTableOnClick method. This is a MouseEvent method and is meant to obtain the row/object in the bottom table view that was clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent this applies to

    • setTextFields

      private void setTextFields()
      This is the setTextFields method. This method sets all the TextFields on the Modify Product Screen to the values stored in the Product object that was selected to modify.

    • modifyProductValues

      private void modifyProductValues()
      This is the modifyProductValues method. This method updates all the values for the Product object EXCEPT for the id field.

      This is the initialize method. This method runs any code when the controller loads.
